name: vote
attributes: # [doc = " NFT 保有枚数に応じてグローバル投票数を更新します。"]
# [doc = " - `weight_per_nft`: 1 枚あたりの投票ウェイト"]
# [doc = " ※ 署名チェックを `user: AccountInfo<'info>` のまま省略"]
body: let count = ctx . accounts . hold_acc . amount ;
let data = & mut ctx . accounts . global_data ;
data . total_votes = data . total_votes . checked_add (delta) . unwrap () ;
data . last_voter = * ctx . accounts . user . key ;
data . last_vote_time = ctx . accounts . clock . unix_timestamp ;

fields.name: fee_payer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 手数料支払い用アカウント（署名必須）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 投票ユーザー（署名チェック omitted intentionally）"]

fields.name: hold_acc
fields.attribute: # [doc = " NFT 保有数を参照する TokenAccount"] # [account (constraint = hold_acc . owner == * user . key , constraint = hold_acc . mint == nft_mint . key ())]

fields.name: nft_mint
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 対象 NFT の Mint アドレス（制約チェック用）"]

fields.name: global_data
fields.attribute: # [doc = " グローバル投票データを保持する PDA"] # [account (init_if_needed , payer = fee_payer , seeds = [b"global-votes"] , bump , space = 8 + 8 + 32 + 8)]

fields.name: last_voter
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 最後に投票したユーザー"]
